item.title: An Extremely Overkill LEGO RC Car from Airplane Parts
item.description: This article is not yet complete, just publishing it for testing purposes It’s been a while since I last played around with LEGO Technic. About 4 years to be exact. I can say with absolute confidence that this was my favorite way to spend time in my younger years. I recollect building all sorts of crazy things from an automatic lego crossbow to a massive Mercedes Benz Unimog with a working suspension and a functioning pneumatic crane.
